caption.p: Raw (A) and normalized on 1382 cm – 1 band. (B) Raman spectra of healthy (green), rice and rice with 80 mM (red), and 120 mM (blue) salinity stresses. Difference spectra are shown in the Supplementary Figure S5. The 1440 cm −1 peak, which was used for spectral normalization, is indicated by an asterisk (*).
